changelog:
Version 2.3.0.0

New Features:

  • PowerPoint Slide Control: Added ability to detect active PowerPoint presentation window and send next/previous slide commands, as well as start and end the slideshow directly from the app.
  • Gemini AI Integration: Advent Media Player is now powered with AI using Google's Gemini API. A dedicated 'Gemini AI' tab has been added to the settings panel, allowing users to securely input and manage their API key. This centralizes configuration for all current and future AI-driven features.
  • Hymn Suggestions via AI: Introduced intelligent hymn recommendation based on worship type and timing. Suggestions are filtered against the media list to ensure lyrics are available and presentation-ready.

Enhancements:

  • JSON-Based Data Architecture: Revamped internal data handling by migrating from legacy `.txt` files to structured `.json` format. This enables faster parsing, better validation, and future-proof extensibility.
  • Lyrics Sync Overhaul: Lyrics syncing is now fully integrated with the new JSON structure, eliminating the need for separate folder-based sync files.

Removed:

  • Chroma Theme: Chroma theme screen support removed.
  • Edit List: Found under the 'Media' menu, this feature is now deprecated.

Version 2.2.1.73

Enhancements:

  • Changelog: Updated changelog text style.
  • Seek Bar: Hide seek bar on bible mode.

Version 2.2.1.72

Enhancements:

  • Custom Seek Bar Integration: Replaced the default Windows Media Player trackbar with a fully customized seek bar for enhanced flexibility, responsiveness, and visual appeal.
  • Refined Indicator Aesthetics: Introduced a sleek 3D-styled playback thumb that darkens on direct hover, offering a more intuitive and modern interaction.
  • Interactive Playback Scrubbing: Users can now click and drag the seek indicator to scrub through the media timeline with precision.
  • Contextual Hover Feedback: Trackbar now dims gracefully on hover—only during active playback—creating a cohesive and responsive visual state.

Version 2.2.1.69

Enhancements:

  • Improved File Association Support: Seamlessly open supported media via Open with → Advent Media Player.

Version 2.2.1.68

New Features:

  • Expanded Drag & Drop Support: You can now drag and drop TXT, DOC, DOCX, PPT, and PPTX files directly into Advent Media Player. The extracted text is automatically processed and formatted into lyrics with excess spacing removed for a clean layout.
  • Context Menu Integration: Right-click any supported video file (e.g., .mp4, .avi, .mkv) and select \"Play with Advent Media Player\" for instant playback.
  • \"Open With\" Support: Advent Media Player is now registered in the system’s \"Open with\" menu, allowing you to set it as the default media handler.
  • Multi-Screen Playback Support: Video playback now works properly on extended displays—even when launched via Explorer or context menu.

Version 2.2.1.66

New Features:

  • Drag & Drop Support: Easily add media files by dragging and dropping directly into the player. Bulk drag-and-drop is also supported for efficient workflow.
  • Folder-to-Album Creation: Dropping a folder auto-creates a new album with the same name, streamlining organization.

Version 2.2.1.64

Fixes:

  • Bible Search Correction: Now supports books with translated or alternate titles.

Version 2.2.1.63

Enhancements:

  • Faster Bible Comparison: Reduced load times when comparing translations.
  • Changelog Viewer: Built-in changelog accessible from within the app.
